tasks.title: Set up SQLite database with better-sqlite3
tasks.description: Add better-sqlite3 to backend/package.json dependencies. Create backend/src/db.js that: (1) imports better-sqlite3, (2) creates/opens a database file at backend/todos.db, (3) creates a todos table with schema: id (INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT), title (TEXT NOT NULL), description (TEXT DEFAULT ''), completed (BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0), created_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), updated_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), (4) exports a db instance as the default export. The database file should be auto-created on first run. Also write a basic test file backend/src/db.test.js that validates the database connection and table creation.
acceptance_criteria: backend/src/db.js exists and exports db instance
todos table created with correct schema
Database file auto-created on first import

tasks.title: Validate SQLite database setup
tasks.description: Run the database test file to verify that the SQLite database is created correctly with the todos table schema. Verify that backend/src/db.js can be imported without errors and that the database file is created.
acceptance_criteria: Database file is created on import
Todos table exists with correct schema
